name: Museum Project (KitsuneStudio)
description:
Its Space Museum! IN SPACE! This show my level design skill, lighting, animation, and coding picking up and drop item. It even show that I can use existing packs, models, and texture to make a level. 

The glowing texture, rocket, stands, glowing animation shapes, and level layout are what I make.

The rest of the models and texture are from a free packs in Epic Game and Poly Haven.

Controls:

- WASD to move

- Space to jump

- E to pick up 

- Q to quit

- Esc key to escape game.
